actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that conservation expenditures by electric utilities are deductible for the year in which paid or incurred.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an electric utility a deduction for energy conservation expenditures which are paid or incurred in connection with its trade or business as expenses which are not chargeable to its capital account.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that conservation expenditures by electric utilities are deductible for the year in which paid or incurred.
